Author: wild_banana_cookie
Text: Personally I find all buffets gross just because of the stuff people do there and the quality of the food. I also don't understand how people could eat so much food without feeling sick. Makes me nauseous.

Author: TiinyTunes
Text: I'm not much help, I have zero advice, but I fucking hate golden corral. I don't understand the people who willingly spend their money there. I get irrationally angry about it. Like now. Just thinking about it.   Yep. I don't have issues at all.   Also, fuck that place.
